channel.title: [FM] London Revolution - Day Six - New Reign (Monarchist have prevailed!)
channel.description:
## [color=DarkGreen] Introduction: [/color]
Hello and welcome to this Forum Match! Like others it is mafia game with a "Town", "Mafia" and Neutrals but there is some different aspects which are differ from typical forum mafia game.
First of all this is about alternative history when in England as a result of revolutionary riots in the nineteeth century has been divided into Democratic West and Monarchist East. London was fenced with a brick wall and the city itself has become a place of secret spy war. And there is some special events!
Only "Town", some "Mafia" and Neutral Killer's role cards are revealed to the public! All roles that were in the game will be revealed **after** the game ends.
## [color=DarkGreen] Rules: [/color]
1. No gamethrowing. 2. No editing messages. 3. No private messaging with others in the game about the game. 4. Don't show your role card to anyone without permission from the Host. 5. [color=Cyan]This is my mod color. Don't try to use it in chat![/color] 6. Most importantly have fun! After all this is why you're here. 7. Breaking any of those rules will be effective in a warming and next attempts would be follow up by potential modkill.
## [color=DarkGreen] Gameplay: [/color]
- Days will be 3 IRL days long or shorter if someone would be lynched. - Nights will be 1 IRL day long. - Actions are done by DM me in role card. - Democrats will have separate chat that can be used during a day and night. - After receiving a role card, you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it.
## [color=DarkGreen] Executions: [/color]
- To accuse someone say “/lynch [player]” or “/vote [player]”. - If a player gets enough votes they would be lynched immediately and end the day.
## [color=DarkGreen] Journals: [/color]
- Message me your journal, the last draft I receive would be posted at the chat after you die.
## [color=DarkGreen] How to Join: [/color]
- Just say something like "/join", "in" or whatever you want to express your interest in joining.
## [color=DarkGreen] Role Cards: [/color] - Role cap for all non-unique is set on 2. Civilian cap is 3. :shield: = Unique
[color=Orange]Monarchists[/color] [details="Summary"] > ## [color=Orange]Quenn Victoria[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: :star: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Special[/color]** **Head Of The Nation (Passive)** - Your vote count twice. **Royal Decree (Day)** - Guarantee your target’s ability is successful and accurate. - 2 uses **Personal Guard (Night)** - Protect the player from harmful effects including killing. - 4 uses **Eager Speech (Night)** - Make all players immune to occupation tonight. - 2 uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Prime Minister[/color] :shield: :speech_balloon: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Social [/color]** **Royal Relative (Passive)** - You know what is happening with Queen Victoria. **Messenger (Day)** - Send anonymously letter with max 1000 letters to player. - 3 uses **Political Finger (Day)** - Force player to vote your target. - 2 uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Royal Guardsman[/color] :dagger: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Killer [/color]** **Regret (Passive)** - Commit suicite at the following night if you killed Monarchist. **Suprise Attack! (Day)** - Kill the player during a day. - 1 use **Rifle (Night)** - Kill the player. Disable this abillity if you killed Monarchist - 2 uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Burgher[/color] :hammer: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Offensive[/color]** **Businessman (Passive)** - Immune to occupation. **Bribe (Night)** - Occupy the player. - Infinite uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Inspector[/color] :mag: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Investigative[/color]** **Nightwatch (Day)** - See if member of the Democrats visited your target tonight. - Infinite uses **Interrogation (Night)** - Determine if player is a member of the Democrats. - Infinite uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Surgeon[/color] :wrench: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Support[/color]** **Known Doctor (Passive)** - Immune to poison and bleeding. **Heal (Night)** - Prevent the player from dying, healing their wounds incuding poison and bleed. - Infinite uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Constable[/color] :dagger: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Killer [/color]** **Guard (Night)** - Protect the player, giving your live and killing the attacker. - Infinite uses **Stoppage! (Night)** - Prevent any visits to your target. - 2 uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Informant[/color] :mag: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Investigative[/color]** **Discretion (Passive)** - Your visits are hidden. **Tracking (Night)** - See who your target will visit. - Infinite uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Peasant[/color] :hammer: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Offensive[/color]** **Drugde (Day)** - Immune to redirection. **Poor Fellow (Night)** - Force player to use their abillity on you. - Infinite uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Bourgeoisie[/color] :shield: :wrench: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Support[/color]** **Health Elixir (Night)** - Give the player immunity to death tonight. - 2 uses **Refreshing Drink (Night)** - Give the player immunity from negative effects except killing. - 4 uses *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Orange]Civilian[/color] :speech_balloon: > **[color=Orange]Monarchist Social[/color]** _None. But you can vote during a day._ *Defeat Democrats and any neutral who try to oppose you.* [/details] [color=Blue]Democrats[/color]
[details="Summary"] > ## [color=Blue]Governor[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: :star: > **[color=Blue]Democrat Special[/color]** **Politician (Passive)** - You will appear as not suspicious to investigative roles. **Intoxication (Day)** - Poison the player. They will die after two night unless healed. Bypassing Death Immunity. - 4 uses **Dirty Work (Night)** - Kill the player. - Infinite uses (Not Usable until Soldier is alive) **Documentary (Night)** - Determine player's faction. - 3 uses *Defeat Monarchists and any neutral who try to oppose you.*
> ## [color=Blue]Soldier[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: :dagger: > **[color=Blue]Democrat Killer[/color]** **Worthy Successor (Passive)** - When you die, the other Democrat will become Soldier except Governor. **Murder! (Night)** - Kill the player. - Infinite uses *Defeat Monarchists and any neutral who try to oppose you.* [/details]
[color=Grey]Neutrals[/color]
[details="Summary"] > ## [color=Grey]Anarchist[/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: :dagger: > **[color=Grey]Neutral Killer[/color]** **Resolve (Passive)** - Immune to death and occupation. **Substitution of tools(Day)** - Choose a player. His next night abillity will come with incorrect feedback. - 3 uses **Bomb Away! (Night)** - Throw a bomb into the player. It will explode after next night killing target and all visitors. - Infinite uses *Kill the members of the main factions and any neutrals who try to oppose you.* [/details]
## [color=DarkGreen] Rolelist: [/color] - [color=Orange] Queen Victoria[/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Orange] Monarchist [/color] [color=Blue] Governor [/color] [color=Blue] Soldier [/color] [color=Blue] Democrat [/color] [color=Grey] Anarchist [/color] [color=Grey] Neutral [/color] [color=Litegray] Unknown[/color]
## [color=DarkGreen] Playerlist: [/color] 1. <S> MaximusPrime [color=Blue] (Soldier) [/color] </S> 2. Celeste_Ludenberg [color=Orange] (Conservative) [/color] :open_book: 3. <S> HTM [color=Blue] (Social-Democrat) [/color] </S> 4. <S> FireKitten [color=Orange] (Informant) [/color] </S> 5. <S> Sam17z [color=Grey] (Conductor) [/color] </S> 6. <S> Marluxion [color=Orange] (Conservative) [/color] :open_book: </S> 7. <S> Boss110 [color=Blue] (Governor) [/color] </S> 8. <S> psychoneirik [color=Orange] (Informant) [/color] </S> 9. <S> CaptainNerbins [color=Grey] (Anarchist) [/color] </S> 10. <S> Pug [color=Blue] (Soldier) [/color] </S> 11. <S> Frostwolf103 [color=Orange] (Constable) [/color] </S> 12. <S> Hippolytus [color=Orange] (Surgeon) [/color] </S> 13. PoisonedSquid [color=Orange] (Burgher) [/color] 14. <S> orangeandblack5 [color=Orange](Queen Victoria)[/color] :crown: </S> 15. Whammerist [color=Orange] (Conservative) [/color] :open_book: 16. <S> Shurian [color=Orange] (Royal Guardsman) [/color] </S>
## [color=DarkGreen] Timelaps: [/color] [Start of Game / D1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-london-revolution-day-one-confirmation-phase-16-16/61670/263?u=twil1ight) [End of D1 / No Lynch ](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-london-revolution-night-one-dark-alley-16-16/61670/858?u=twil1ight) [Start Of
